Title: Erratum to: Magnetic Technique for Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy in Melanoma: The MELAMAG Trial (Ann Surg Oncol, 10.1245/S10434-016-5113-7)
Abstract: © 2016, Society of Surgical Oncology.In the initial online publication, the MELAMAG Multicentre Trialists Group was omitted from the author group. The MELAMAG Multicentre Trialists Group has been added in the publication as shown in this erratum.
